    • contains

      public static boolean contains​(int value, int[] array)
      A method that checks if a given value is found within a given array
      Parameters:
      value - the given value that is checked to see if it is contained in the array
      array - the given array from which the given value is searched for
      Returns:
      true if the value is in the array, false if it is not

    • containsSameValues

      public static int containsSameValues​(int[] array1, int[] array2)
      A method that checks how many int values are shared between to int arrays
      Parameters:
      array1 - the first array
      array2 - the second array
      Returns:
      the number of values that appear in both arrays

    • removeIndex

      public static int[] removeIndex​(int[] original, int index)
      A method that removes a given index from a given int array
      Parameters:
      original - the int array that is to be updated
      index - the index that is removed from original
      Returns:
      the new int array with one index removed

    • sort

      public static int[] sort​(int[] array)
      A method that sorts an int array into ascending order
      Parameters:
      array - the array that is to be sorted
      Returns:
      the sorted array

    • addPrefix

      public static String addPrefix​(int[] array, int prefixAmount, boolean autoPrefix)
      A method that converts the values in an array into a string with a given amount of zeros added as a prefix to each
      Parameters:
      array - the array which will be converted into a string
      prefixAmount - the amount of zeros added to the beginning of each value
      autoPrefix - if true, the amount zeros added is determined by the amount of digits in the largest value
      Returns:
      the values from the array with the prefix added as a list in String format

    • findLongest

      public static int findLongest​(int[] array)
      A method that finds out the amount if digits in the longest number within an array
      Parameters:
      array - the array from which the largest amount of digits is determined
      Returns:
      the amount of digits in the longest number

    • toStringArray

      public static String[] toStringArray​(int[] array)
      A method that converts an int array to a String array
      Parameters:
      array - the int array that is converted
      Returns:
      the new String array
